text: Ned bɨ nɨm ak tap si tap tɨmel nokom olap gek, tap si tap tɨmel anɨb ak binɨb kɨlop gek, kumeb ak kɨlop mɨdupsek kodak. God pen kɨlop pel yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨl, kɨlop monmon dɨtep gɨl agak, Binɨb suŋtep yad agak. Pen binɨb tap anɨb okok dɨnɨgabal okok, bɨ nokom olap Jisas Klays kɨlop gak. Kɨlop gek, kɨli Klays ayɨp mɨdɨl ne ayɨp tap okok mɨdupsek dɨl kod yenɨgabal. Kɨli anɨgɨl yenɨgabal okok, kɨli kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl yenɨgabal, kumeb kɨles ma yenɨgab.
